name: ノイズ
message: "So, what do we do with this guy?"
Noiz kicks Akushima's back, flipping him face up.
He's unconscious, his big mouth hanging wide open.
His eyes looked the same as Mizuki's, which probably means that someone was controlling him.
I think back to the moment I stopped him with my power.
Although the words had come from my mouth, it hadn't felt like my voice at the time.
And then, there's the word I used.
"Fall."
It rolled so naturally off my tongue, but it's not the kind of thing I'd ever say like that to someone.
...I feel the fear of my power more keenly than ever. Every time I use it, it's like I'm losing some part of myself.

name: ノイズ
message: "Doesn't look like he's gonna wake up. Do we leave him?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Hey."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Oh, uh, sure."
Startled, I nod in response. Noiz gives me a dubious look.

name: ノイズ
message: "What's with you?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Nothing."
My Coil suddenly beeps.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Spam again?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Lemme see."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh? Hey!"
Before I can stop him, Noiz connects my Coil to his and starts analyzing the message.

name: ノイズ
message: "...Thought so. Can't trace it. It's almost like it wasn't sent from anywhere to begin with."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What does that mean?"

name: ノイズ
message: "They masked it in junk data. Network's full of the shit."

name: ノイズ
message: "But this is Platinum Jail. It's hard to imagine anyone accessing the network from the outside. Which leaves only one answer, though I don't know they would..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Someone inside Platinum Jail is trying to contact me."

name: ノイズ
message: "Yeah."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But assume this message is a trap. What does it mean?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Exactly what it says. Door's open."

name: 蒼葉
message: "If it is, then it's definitely a trap. ...Toue's trap."

name: ノイズ
message: "You said it. What you gonna do?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well... Looks like there's traps everywhere we turn."

name: ノイズ
message: "So we're heading to the tower?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: ノイズ
message: "Could be worse."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. ...Let's go."
I don't know if this is the right path.
But we're already dancing in the palm of our enemy's hand. Our only choice is to see it through.
We head for Oval Tower, the heart of Platinum Jail.
